name: "Color"
description: This is my first venture into NFT poetry.  "Color" is a poem I wrote years ago in gratitude for all the variety of experiences, people, and lessons God brought into my life.  The photograph is one I took on New Years day 2020 and then animated.  Thanks for listening, even more for collecting.  May your life be full of amazing color as well.  ... Produced by @fotochad.
